scripts.install: (cd UKAUth && npm install) & (cd UKClient && npm install) & (cd UKProtectedResource && npm install)
scripts.build: (cd UKAUth && npm run build) & (cd UKClient && npm run build) & (cd UKProtectedResource && npm run build)
scripts.clean: (cd UKAUth && rm -rf ./dist) & (cd UKClient && rm -rf ./dist) & (cd UKProtectedResource && rm -rf ./dist)
